articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yun Myong Do
   Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Monday sent a wreath to the bier of the late Yun Myong Do, a general officer of the KPA, expressing deep condolences on his death.
